articles.content: After being snatched in an armed robbery last Wednesday, Lady Gagas stolen French Bulldogs, Koji and Gustav, were returned unharmed to Los Angeles police. Her dog walker, Ryan Fischer, however, remai… [+2204 chars]

articles.author: Lucy Battersby
articles.content: Risk appetite fell on Tuesday as disappointing economic data piled on top of warnings from Chinese regulators that US and European stock markets were over-priced compared to economic growth and China… [+2157 chars]
articles.description: The S&P/ASX 200 turned a strong start into a decline, along with major Asian markets, as traders pared back Monday’s gains and economic data disappointed.
articles.title: As it happened: ASX drops 0.4% as risk appetite declines - The Sydney Morning Herald
